div.h4: Board of Education Meeting Cancelled for Monday, April 13, 2020

td.div:
The Board of Education Meeting scheduled for Monday, April 13, 2020 at 7pm in the MS/HS Library is CANCELLED.
The next regular meeting is scheduled for Monday, April 27, 2020 at 7pm in the MS/HS Library.

h4.a: Information from the Bay County Health Department

td.div:
Please see the sheet below for information from the Bay County Health Department regarding the Coronavirus (COVID-19).
For the latest information regarding COVID-19, please reference the following websites:
Bay County Health Department
Centers for Disease Control
Michigan Department of Health and Human Services
March 19, 2020
Board of Education Meeting Cancelled for Monday, March 23, 2020
The Board of Education Meeting scheduled for Monday, March 23, 2020 at 7pm at Central Elementary is CANCELLED.
The next regular meeting is scheduled for Monday, April 13, 2020 at 7pm in the MS/HS Library.
March 16, 2020
Food for Families During School Closure
**Due to the extension of the school closure, we will be offering food on the following dates as well:
Wednesday, April 1st - 11:00 am - 1 pm,
Monday, April 6th - 11:00 am - 1 pm,
Wednesday, April 8th - 11:00 am - 1pm
**You can choose whichever pickup location is convenient for you, it is not based on which school your children attend**
Please view the letter below for information regarding the Pinconning Area Schools food services that will be available during the current school closure. Be sure to complete the survey that is referenced in the letter so that we are better able to prepare and accommodate for the necessary need. You can follow the link here: Link to "Grab-and-Go" Meal Form
Our goal is to make sure that all children in our community have the resources that they need.
Please also find a copy of the menu below for the food that will be provided. **Updated 3/21/2020**
If you have any questions, please contact our Food Service Director, Sue Ross, at 989-308-0541 or 989-948-2248. You may also contact the Administration Office at 989-308-0506.
UPDATED MENU
March 3 / March 12, 2020
Coronavirus Information
**Important Update** Please view the most current letter below regarding cancellation of non-essential gatherings**
The Michigan Department of Health and Human Services (MDHHS) is working closely with healthcare providers, local public health departments, and the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) to actively monitor any potential cases of 2019 Novel Coronavirus in Michigan. MDHHS will update information as it becomes available at: michigan.gov/coronavirus.
Please see the letters below and attached fact sheets for more information.

font.b: Pinconning Area School District | 605 W. Fifth St., Pinconning, MI 48650 | Phone : (989)308-0500 | Fax (989)879-4705
